nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_689
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: (Just) as a machine needs regular running, so does the body need regular exercise.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_690
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He learned to play the piano while studying in the United States.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_691
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: To our disappointment, he turned down our invitation.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_692
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The reality is that, for better or worse, the world has changed with the advance of new technologies.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_693
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Most of the female students in my class appear to be ill at ease when (they are) required to answer questions.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_694
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The local government took charge of the security for the sports meeting.
